content: same 3 st decrease again drop off left needle k5* repeat from *to* across to last 3st k1 yo k1 yo k1 166 st r12 p2 yo p to last 2 st p2tog r13 k to the last 2 st yo k1 yo k1 168 st r14 p2 yo p to last 2 st p2tog r15 k3 *p3tog leave 3 st on left needle yo p same 3 st decrease again drop off left needle k5* repeat from *to* across to last 5st k3 yo k1 yo k1 170 st r16 p2 yo p to last 2 st p2tog r17 k to the last 2 st yo k1 yo k1 172 st r18 p2 yo p to last 2 st p2tog r19 k5 *p3tog leave 3 st on left needle yo p same 3 st decrease again drop off left needle k5* repeat from *to* across to last 7st p3tog leave 3 st on left needle yo p same 3 st decrease again drop off left needle k2 yo k1 yo k1 174 st r20 p2 yo p to last 2 st p2tog r21 k to the last 2 st yo k1 yo k1 176 st r22 p2 yo p to last 2 st p2tog 7 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern wildflower knots section cont… r23 k7 *p3tog leave 3 st on left needle yo p same 3 st decrease again drop off left needle k5* repeat from *to* across to last 9st p3tog leave 3 st on left needle yo p same 3 st decrease again drop off left needle k4 yo k1 yo k1 178 st r24 p2 yo p to last 2 st p2tog garter section 4 repeat garter section 2 24 row total you should have 202 st bobble all stitches in your preferred bind off method if you bobble tightly i would suggest using a stretchy bind off weave in all ends and block finished size is approximately 52 ½ from the cast off edge 39 from the cast on to the cast off edge and approximately 66 from the neck edge 8 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern 66 /167 cm 39 /99cm 56 ½ / 144 cm should you have any questions please send them to pattern help unrulystitch@gmail com feel free to use the hashtag #theunrulystitchmakes on instagram or facebook of your
